thread.title: The Best Jewelry at the Golden Globes
thread.title_full: The Best Jewelry at the Golden Globes

author: Janelle Okwodu
title: The Best Jewelry at the Golden Globes
text:
Photo: Getty Images See more photos of: 
Admit it, awards season fashion isn’t complete without jewelry. Diamonds, emeralds, and oversize estate pieces are what give all those red carpet looks their added oomph, and at the Golden Globes , Hollywood’s biggest stars don’t hold back on the bling. The night provides them with the perfect excuse to show off, and they take full advantage. Attendees arrive wearing all manner of opulent creations—exquisite gemstones, one-of-a-kind designs, and larger-than-life glitz. 
Though this year’s assortment of silver gowns and sequined dresses meant that many opted for understated bijou, that didn’t lessen the array of beautiful, sparkling baubles on display. Here, a closer look at the very best jewelry featured at tonight’s ceremony, from Emma Stone ’s diamond choker to Tracee Ellis Ross’s intricate layered rings.
